Package org.heigit.ohsome.ohsomeapi.exception

Class CustomizedExceptionHandler

java.lang.Object
org.springframework.web.servlet.mvc.method.annotation.ResponseEntityExceptionHandler
org.heigit.ohsome.ohsomeapi.exception.CustomizedExceptionHandler
@ControllerAdvice @RestController public class CustomizedExceptionHandler extends org.springframework.web.servlet.mvc.method.annotation.ResponseEntityExceptionHandler
Custom handler to modify the different exception responses.
